items.content_html: Notably is a lightweight, personalized note-taking web-app designed for efficient task and life management. It serves as a to-do list while offering widgets that provide key updates on inevitable aspects of daily life. With a focus on simplicity and usability, it helps users stay organized and informed in a seamless, intuitive way.
items.title: Nemoxus/Notably: Notably is a lightweight, personalized note-taking web-app designed for efficient task and life management. It serves as a to-do list while offering widgets that provide key updates on inevitable aspects of daily life. With a focus on simplicity and usability, it helps users stay organized and informed in a seamless, intuitive way.

items.content_html: Hello the name is Mudit. I am using Typescript with Express JS for this assignment as this application with it's lightweight operations and simplicity requirements can be best created using an express backend. Postgres is used for DB, MongoDB Notification storage, Redis Caching, Socket IO for notification.
items.title: Mudit2003/cloudsek-assignment: Hello the name is Mudit. I am using Typescript with Express JS for this assignment as this application with it's lightweight operations and simplicity requirements can be best created using an express backend. Postgres is used for DB, MongoDB Notification storage, Redis Caching, Socket IO for notification.
